metadata.title: CVE-2022-41325 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow in the VNC module in VideoLAN VLC Media Player through3.0.17.4 allows attackers, by tricking a user into opening a craftedplaylist or connecting to a rogue VNC server, to crash VLC or execute codeunder some conditions.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
